feature.name: Primal Path: Path of the Skald (HB)
feature.text:
The fury and heroics of battle inspire some barbarians. Those that follow the Path of the Skald take that inspiration and spread it to their allies, becoming a beacon that inspires them to greatness. Raging is your performance, this drapa brings the vigor of battle to your allies.
Source: GM Toolkit Monthly - Legends of Norse Mythology

feature.name: Keeper of Stories (Path of the Skald (HB))
feature.text:
As a skald you remember the heroic tales of old. At third level, you gain proficiency in performance, history, and one musical instrument of your choice.
Source: GM Toolkit Monthly - Legends of Norse Mythology

feature.name: Raging Drapa (Path of the Skald (HB))
feature.text:
At third level, you emanate a 20 ft. Drapa aura while raging. Choose one of the following effects for the aura when you begin your rage.
Verses of the Mighty: Allies within your aura add your rage damage bonus to their attack rolls.
Verses of the Sentinel: At the end of each of your turns, allies within your aura gain a number of temporary hit points equal to your rage damage bonus.
Verses of the Unyielding: Allies within your aura gain a bonus to their saving throws equal to your rage damage bonus.
Source: GM Toolkit Monthly - Legends of Norse Mythology

feature.name: Thunderous Shout (Path of the Skald (HB))
feature.text:
Starting at 6th level, when you take the Attack action, you can cast thunder wave at level 1, in place of one of your attacks. The spell save DC is equal to 8 + proficiency bonus + Constitution modifier. When you do this, add your Strength modifier and, if you are raging, your rage damage bonus to the damage roll. You can use this feature a number of times equal to your proficiency bonus, regaining all expended uses when you finish a long rest.
Source: GM Toolkit Monthly - Legends of Norse Mythology

feature.name: Ancestral Edda (Path of the Skald (HB))
feature.text:
At 10th level, you can cast Legend Lore without using material components. After using this feature, you must finish a long rest before you can use it again.
Source: GM Toolkit Monthly - Legends of Norse Mythology

feature.name: Vigorous Drapa (Path of the Skald (HB))
feature.text:
While raging, your drapa aura has one of the following additional effects, chosen when you begin your rage.
Metre of the Furious: Allies within your aura may add your rage damage bonus to their melee damage rolls.
Metre of the Reckless: Allies within your aura may use the reckless attack feature as if they had the feature.
Metre of the Hero: At the end of your turn, allies within your aura regain a number of hit points equal to half your rage damage bonus.
Source: GM Toolkit Monthly - Legends of Norse Mythology
